name: EKAudioPlayer
tagline: Framework for playing music from the iTunes library.
body:
### An easier way to play music from the iTunes library.
This framework includes an easier way to access the music library. It has lots of classes to help handle the logic associated with sorting MPMediaQueries and integrating the views into iOS apps.

### Authors and Contributors
Created by @rikola.

### Contact
Having trouble? File an issue on the [Github Page](https://github.com/rikola/EKAudioPlayer) or email me at koehleree@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
